message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on something unique. I've had great feedback from previous customers who have purchased similar products, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, think of the prestige and satisfaction you'll get from owning a product that's truly exceptional. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and make a statement with this incredible product?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I need more information before making a decision.
